scripts.start: beetpx dev --open --htmlTitle "[dev] Const Injection | BeetPx example" --const envType=dev PREV_COMMIT="$(git rev-parse --short --verify HEAD)"
scripts.build: beetpx build --htmlTitle "Const Injection | BeetPx example" --const envType=prod --const PREV_COMMIT="$(git rev-parse --short --verify HEAD)"
